Land of the Shamrock
Hawarden Park, Hawarden, Flintshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £15 and cornet, 2nd £10, 3rd £7, 4th £5. Best cornet - Longridge. March contest(The King's Messenger) - 1st (£2) Longridge, 2nd (£1) Gossage's 7 bands competed.
